verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Some bright morning when this life is over
I'll fly away
To that home on Gods celestial shore
I'll fly away

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I'll fly away, oh glory
I'll fly away in the morning
When I die hallelujah by and by
I'll fly away

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When the shadows of this life have gone
I'll fly away
Like a bird from these prison walls I'll fly
I'll fly away

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I'll fly away, oh glory
I'll fly away in the morning
When I die hallelujah by and by
I'll fly away

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Oh how glad and happy when we meet
I'll fly away
No more cold iron shackles on my feet
I'll fly away

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
I'll fly away oh glory
I'll fly away in the morning
When I die hallelujah by and by
I'll fly away

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
I'll fly away oh glory
I'll fly away in the morning
When I die hallelujah by and by
I'll fly away

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Just a few more weary days and then
I'll fly away
To a land where joys will never end
I'll fly away

verse.name: v9
verse.lines:
I'll fly away oh glory
I'll fly away in the morning
When I die hallelujah by and by
I'll fly away
I'll fly away
